price: 46 Et une épreuve plus terrible et plus amère les attend à l’Heure du jugement.
arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: bali al-sāʿatu mawʿiduhum wal-sāʿatu adhā wa-amarru
